channel.title: 317_(delta base) thieving stalls

item.title: 317_(delta base) thieving stalls
item.dc:creator: @l_skinner_l l skinner l
item.description:
@l_skinner_l wrote:

i have made some thieving stalls and made them give random items i cannot get it to give an item every so seconds like if i rapid click it it fills my inve with item under like 10 seconds like really fast i want to be able to thieve the stall every 5 seconds how can i do this? here is my code. if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 100k", 99, 10000*playerLevel[15], 995, 100000, 0x340); addItem(Item.randomBox(), 3); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 10k", 1, 500*playerLevel[17], 995, 10000, 0x340); addItem(Item.randomBox(), 0); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 50k", 50, 300*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340); addItem(Item.randomBox(), 1); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("vegetable stall", "and recieve 25k", 75, 600*playerLevel[16], 995, 25000, 0x340); addItem(Item.randomBox(), 2); }

Read full topic
